SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

org.alljoyn.bus
Class MessageContext

Object
  MessageContext

public final class MessageContext
extends Object

Contains information about a specific method call or signal message.

Field Summary
 String authMechanism
          The authentication mechanism in use for this message.
 String destination
          The destination for this message.
 String interfaceName
          The interface for this message.
 boolean isUnreliable
          true if the message is unreliable.
 String memberName
          The member (method/signal) name for this message.
 String objectPath
          The object path for this message.
 String sender
          The sender for this message.
 int sessionId
          The session ID that the sender used to send the message.
 String signature
          The signature for this message.
 
Method Summary
 
Methods inherited from class Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Field Detail

isUnreliable

public boolean isUnreliable
true if the message is unreliable. Unreliable messages have a non-zero time-to-live and may be silently discarded.

objectPath

public String objectPath
The object path for this message. An empty string if unable to find the AllJoyn object path.

interfaceName

public String interfaceName
The interface for this message. An empty string if unable to find the AllJoyn interface.

memberName

public String memberName
The member (method/signal) name for this message. An empty string if unable to find the member name.

destination

public String destination
The destination for this message. An empty string if unable to find the message destination.

sender

public String sender
The sender for this message. An empty string if the message did not specify a sender.

sessionId

public int sessionId
The session ID that the sender used to send the message.

signature

public String signature
The signature for this message. An empty string if unable to find the AllJoyn signature.

authMechanism

public String authMechanism
The authentication mechanism in use for this message.
